name: characterologically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to character or the study of character: Characterologically speaking, the party has had an astonishing run of bad luck. The secret to winning the war was believed to be located in the home and to be characterologically embodied in women.
More examplesFewer examplesPeople who are characterologically depressed, or have a history of major depression may be included in this group.Characterologically, his analyst reported that he was making very significant progress.
